thread.title: Gronk, Odell Beckham Jr., Tony Romo, And Other NFL Superstars Read ‘Mean Tweets’ On Jimmy Kimmel
thread.title_full: Gronk, Odell Beckham Jr., Tony Romo, And Other NFL Superstars Read ‘Mean Tweets’ On Jimmy Kimmel

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Gronk, Odell Beckham Jr., Tony Romo, And Other NFL Superstars Read ‘Mean Tweets’ On Jimmy Kimmel
text:
It’s Super Bowl week which means we’re gifted with the annual NFL edition of Jimmy Kimmel’s Mean Tweets. 
Watch as Odell Beckham Jr., Tony Romo, Rob Gronkowski, J.J. Watt and several other past and present NFL superstars take turns getting roasted by Twitter trolls. 
NEW #MeanTweets @NFL edition with @OBJ_3 @JJWatt @DeMarcoMurray @MichaelIrvin88 @TonyRomo @Kurt13Warner @DangeRussWilson & more… #SB51 pic.twitter.com/ESTwOVXeH8 
— Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 3, 2017
